original_text: As he was getting into the boat, the man who had been possessed with demons begged him that he might be with him.
korean_text: 예수께서 배에 오르실 때에 귀신 들렸던 사람이 함께 있기를 간구하였으나

sentences.original_text: As he was getting into the boat
the man who had been possessed with demons
that he might be with him
